metadata.title: CVE-2023-5477 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Installer in Google Chrome prior to118.0.5993.70 allowed a local attacker to bypass discretionary accesscontrol via a crafted command. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
